greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coordination sequence of Dual(4.6.12) tiling with respect to a hexavalent node.
comment: Conjecture: For n > 0, a(n)=12n if n even, otherwise 6n.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Illustration of initial terms (shows one 60-degree sector of tiling)
N. J. A. Sloane, Overview of coordination sequences of Laves tilings [Fig. 2.7.1 of Grünbaum-Shephard 1987 with A-numbers added and in some cases the name in the RCSR database]
xref: Cf. A072154, A298039 (partial sums), A298036 (12-valent node), A298040 (tetravalent node).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 22 2018
ext: Terms a(8)-a(54) added by _Tom Karzes_, Apr 01 2020
